QuestData.Title: Relics of the Snow Leopard Goddess
QuestData.Description: I overheard that you are going to see to the well-being of Har'koa. Good luck to you.$B$BI am wondering if while you are in the vicinity of the altar, you would be willing to recover their relics? I do not require many, and it is only a short trip to the southeast.$B$BWhat do you say?
QuestData.LogDescription: Chronicler To'kini at Zim'Torga wants you to recover 10 Har'koan Relics.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Drakkari are so busy destroying themselves, it would be a shame if the historical significance of their empire were to be likewise lost.
QuestData.RewardText: Aw, prime specimens!$B$BYou can see there the divergence from the root symbology. Quite extraordinary.$B$BWhat a pity that the ice trolls are determined to bring about their own demise.$B$BDid you know, for instance, that the Drakkari were exiled from the rest of the troll nations for their extremely violent ways?$B$BIt's true! How did you think trolls ended up in such a harsh climate as this?
